ModMetaData.name: Teleportarium
ModMetaData.author: xannihilusx
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Imperial Teleportarium technology to RimWorld:
- Build Teleportarium Platforms (2x2 and 3x3) to send pawns and items across the map or between maps. - Construct a Teleportarium Cogitator (manned control station) to operate the platforms. Requires power and a pawn to man the cogitator. - Equip pawns with Teleport Homers to recall them (and nearby items/pawns) back to a platform from anywhere in the world. - Teleportation requires a power-up sequence, drains extra power, and can fail if energy is insufficient. - All teleportation and recall actions are gated behind research and require advanced components. - Includes custom sound effects and UI for teleportation and recall.
Buildings added: - Teleportarium Platform (2x2) - Large Teleportarium Platform (3x3) - Teleportarium Cogitator (control station)
Equipment added: - Teleport Homer (apparel for recall)
Use the cogitator to activate teleportation or recall equipped pawns. Requires power, a manned cogitator, and a linked platform on the same power network.
